//: A naked prisoner, from the isherwood faction trapped in a horrifying cage, watching horrible things happen.

job_description: Missing member of the Isherwood family.

dynamic_line.no: *crouches on the bottom of his cell, shivering, then looks up as you approach.  He blinks a few times, then stands up.  He's totally nude, and his tanned body is covered in tiny, precise-looking scars of varying ages.  "I can't believe my eyes.  Please get me outta here…"

responses.text: I'm Luke Skywalker, I'm here to rescue you.
You just hold tight here for a second.

dynamic_line: What?"  The naked, traumatized man stares at you blankly, as though he'd never seen Star Wars, which is clearly ridiculous.  "Rescue me?  Yes, oh please yes!

responses.text: Just hold on a little longer, okay?

dynamic_line: *gulps.  "I sure as hell am.  Did my family send you?  Please, we gotta go.  There are more of those things.  They're everywhere."

responses.text: Just hold on a little longer, okay?

dynamic_line: *switches, abruptly, to pure white-hot rage.  "DOES THIS LOOK LIKE A TIME FOR FUCKING QUESTIONS?"  He stops, shaking, and returns to how he was before.  "I'm sorry.  I'm so sorry.  Oh god, I'm sorry.  I need to get out of here."

responses.text: All right, we're leaving, but you better not test me again.
Pff.  If you're gonna treat me like that, you can stay here.

dynamic_line: *lights up as you approach, but also looks wary.  "Hey, <name_g>."

responses.text: Hey buddy, feel like talking about what you saw in that tower?

dynamic_line: Yeah, I think we need to talk about it, but I'm not ready yet.  Let me reclaim my life for a while.

name.str: Return Barry to Eddie at the dairy.

dialogue.describe: I just want to go home.
dialogue.offer: I can't believe you are here, please take me back to the ranch.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you, I thought I was dead.
dialogue.advice: We shouldn't stay here too long, more might show up.
dialogue.success: Thanks, we'll never be able to repay you, Here's a token of my gratitude, I made these suits for my family and always keep a few extra around.
dialogue.failure: Tell my family that I love them…
